TransformMaps.summary: Represents a collection of TransformMap objects.

Add.summary: Creates and adds the object from the provided values.
Add.returns: A reference to the added item.

LJCSearchID.summary: Retrieve the collection element with name.

LJCSearchSourceID.summary: Retrieve the collection element with Source ID.
LJCSearchSourceID.returns: A reference to the matching item.

LJCSearchTargetID.summary: Retrieve the collection element with Target ID.
LJCSearchTargetID.returns: A reference to the matching item.

LJCSearchColumnIDs.summary: Retrieve the collection element with Source and Target IDs.
LJCSearchColumnIDs.returns: A reference to the matching item.
